Jennifer Tesolin

Welcome to my website that features my portfolio consisting of Github Repositories and Photography, as well as tutorials that are aimed at developers.

This site is created in Jekyll. To see how it was created, have a look at the repository. If you see an issue, you can go ahead an file it there as well.

Jekyll is a static site generator that runs on NodeJS. Its a great alternative to WordPress that eliminates the need for databases.

Bootstrap movie search

This small php application is an app that searches IMDB by using an API from omdbapi.com. This code is using PHP5 and Simple XML as the back-end, while the front end is created using bootstrap.
